attr.title: Void Pyramid
attr.desc: A post-apocalyptic RPG set in the space-faring Egyptian empire. In the far future, the maniacal Prime Pharaoh rules the wastelands of Earth. Any who oppose him are exiled to the Void Pyramid. This outer space prison is populated by criminals, beasts, and mutants.
attr.inst: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid -- extract it, and copy the voidpyramid.rpg file to the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid) -- extract it, and copy the *voidpyramid.rpg* file to the port folder.
